subject: Business
title: Good Debt vs. Bad Debt
description: A quick win: understand Good Debt vs. Bad Debt.

hook.text: A student borrows $40,000 for a degree that doubles their income. A shopper borrows $5,000 for clothes.

buildup.text: Good debt finances assets that grow in value or increase earning power. Bad debt finances depreciating consumption.

discovery.text: Mortgages on rental properties and business loans are typically good debt. Credit card balances on wants are bad debt.

twist.text: Even good debt becomes bad if the terms are wrong. A 15% interest student loan on a low-earning degree destroys value.

climax.text: The wealthy use leverage â€” borrowing to invest in assets that return more than the interest costs.

punchline.text: Borrow to build wealth. Never borrow to look wealthy.

quiz.question: What makes debt 'good'?
options: It finances assets that grow in value or increase earning power
